# start(with:completion:)

**Instance Method**

Command Start

## Declaration

```swift
func start(with params: MTROvenCavityOperationalStateClusterStartParams?, completion: @escaping (MTROvenCavityOperationalStateClusterOperationalCommandResponseParams?, (any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func start(with params: MTROvenCavityOperationalStateClusterStartParams?) async throws -> MTROvenCavityOperationalStateClusterOperationalCommandResponseParams
```

## Discussion

Upon receipt, the device SHALL start its operation if it is safe to do so and the device is in an operational state from which it can be started.
